originalText.text: Love this doctor, he is very knowledgable and patient. He gave me one of my most comfortable dentist experiences ever. He likes to make his patients feel comfortable and really knows what he's doing. He makes you feel comfortable in his chair and explains to  you any procedure step by step. He takes his time with his patients and I never felt rushed,

originalText.text: Came in for an appointment and walked out in 10 minutes before even seeing the dentist. Place was unprofessional as hell. Smelled terrible and was very dirty. A woman was in there complaining about pain from something he screwed up and he wouldn't see her and even told her to come back the next day. There was a little dog running around too, at a dentist office. Terrible first impression so I walked right out to find somewhere cleaner and more professional to trust with my teeth.

originalText.text: YJfter years visting more then 15 dentist around city finaly high professional and very well educated Dentist Nikolas Jimanez DMD. All respect for his understanding and knowledge what he is doing . He become our family dentist with full respect.

originalText.text: Very unprofessional and unreliable. All three fillings fell out after six months.  Wouldn't finish my treatment after mentioned malpractice. Suing for malpractice.

originalText.text: This man is committing insurance fraud by holding my friends Invisalign’s hostage while she is trying to leave him. She’s trying to leave him because he is neglectful, doesn’t listen to anything she says and and doesn’t know what he’s doing. If you care about your teeth try somewhere professional.
